~$ Talking about OSINT on Gateway

Posted on Jan. 5th, 2021.

Tags:TalksOSINT


Yesterday, I gave a small talk about OSINT on the Gateway Discord Community !

It had more to do with the steps involved in OSINT and their objectives, as well as various tools, reporting methods and -- most importantly -- some amateur tips that could've been of interest to the community.

The people of the Gateway Community seemed to like it, so I might talk about it again some other day.

Sadly, an OBS error made it so that the recording has been lost to the ages, but hopefully the things we've learned will stay engraved in the minds of all the participants.

In the meantime, my slides are below and the actual presentation can be found here. I guess you can fill in my exhuberant and overenergetic demeanor on top of it, maybe that'll work.
